title: BRIEF-Village Farms International Reschedules Q4 And Year End Financial Results Conf Call

organizations.name: min read   village farms international inc

text: March 19, 2018 / 2:53 PM / in 7 minutes BRIEF-Village Farms International Reschedules Q4 And Year End Financial Results Conf Call Reuters Staff 1 Min Read   Village Farms International Inc : * VILLAGE FARMS INTERNATIONAL -‍ RESCHEDULES Q4 AND YEAR END FINANCIAL RESULTS CONF CALL TO APRIL 2, 2018 AT 11:00 A.M. ET * VILLAGE FARMS INTERNATIONAL- ‍RESCHEDULES CONF CALL TO ALLOW FOR MORE TIME TO FINALIZE 2017 FINANCIAL STATEMENTS FOR CANNABIS JV, PURE SUNFARMS ​
